title: Normalized Trading Signal
description: Standardized signal format after normalization. Ready for consumption by trading agents.

corr_id.description: Correlation ID from original raw signal for end-to-end tracing.

source.description: Original source system of the signal.

instrument.description: Standardized instrument identifier (e.g., EURUSD, BTC/USD, SPY).

price.description: Signal price level. For forex: exchange rate. For crypto/stocks: price in base currency.

side.description: Trading direction. Null for informational signals without trade intent.

strength.description: Signal confidence/strength (0.0 to 1.0). Null if not provided by source.

timestamp.description: Original signal timestamp from source system (when signal was generated).

normalized_at.description: When this normalized signal was created by the normalization service.

normalizationRules.instrument: Convert all ticker formats to standardized form (EURUSD, BTC/USD, etc.)
normalizationRules.price: Extract numeric price from various source formats
normalizationRules.timestamp: Convert source time formats to ISO 8601
